attributes.action: STOP the building of a gas fired power station in Eye, Suffolk
attributes.additional_details:
• Gas fired power generating station incorporating up to five gas turbine generators with up to five exhaust gas flue stacks.

• A gas pipeline connection to bring natural gas to the power station from the gas national transmission system. This element incorporates an above ground installation at its southern end and a new access road off Potash Lane.
attributes.background: 'Progress Power' are building a gas fired power station on the old Eye, Airfield, which will increase traffic on the A140, will devalue local property, and will blight local lives with an eyesore! We call for the immediate HALT to this project! We call for this to be stopped for our community!
